long_description: The Premier Easy Walk dog harness gently discourages your dog from pulling on its leash. It's easy to fit, easy to use and requires almost no special technique or acclimation time. Unique front-leash attachment redirects pressure to the chest and shoulder blades, preventing choking or gagging. 2 quick-snap buckles make it easy to get the harness on and off your dog. Soft nylon and 4 adjustments points offer great fit and comfort. The Premier Easy Walk dog harness features a belly strap with a complementary color ; easy to identify which strap goes over the shoulders, and which goes under the belly.
short_description: The Premier Easy Walk dog harness gently discourages your dog from pulling on its leash. It's easy to fit, easy to use and requires almost no special technique or acclimation time.
